title: Client is saying I do not own 20 champions
body: I have been playing since season 3 and last night the client brings up the little triangle saying the following member must own 20 champions to play. I was playing ranked yesterday. Please help I have reinstalled the client installed it on a new drive I reinstalled windows the hextech repair tool didn't do anything either I cannot play on my laptop either.

replies.body: logged in like 5 hours ago, saw that i can't play ranked, thought that it may be the problem with windows, bcs i had some kind of virus last day, f*in reinstalled whole windows just to try to fix problem and still nothing, well im kinda frustrated as well
Its obvious that your rig cant support that many champions, have you tried downloading more ram?
It's due to your internet connection. Try logging in with the 4G of your phone. Then, when you're done in champ selection and the game starts, switch back to your regular connection.

Hey friend - I'm sorry you're having this problem! Would you be able to get me your logs from when you were experiencing this problem? If you go to where LoL is installed on your computer, you go: root league client folder > logs > league Client Logs. Then, sort by "date modified" so the most recent log is at the top. Assuming that the last time you logged in is when you had the issue, please drop that file into a dropbox or google drive and share it with me if you can!
Anyone else also unable to use the support page? Anytime I try and go to it I just get a blank page
Happened to me too just now so annoying. Was hoping there was a solution but its not looking like it.
Ive seen a few other people with the same issue since this patch, including myself. So frustrating.
The only thing i could think of is write a support ticket and see if they can do anything
That's what I did but who knows how long it will take riot to respond
I would suggest getting a new graphics card
How would a graphics card have any impact on the client?
